key.name: max-items-per-section
key.description: The maximum number of items shown in the menu sections. This applies to Systemd, Cron, Docker and Podman alike.

key.name: systemd-section-enabled
key.description: Show Systemd section in the menu.

key.name: systemd-section-filter-loaded-services
key.summary: Show only services that Systemd has attempted to load
key.description: Show only services that Systemd has attempted to load. If disabled, all services will be shown, including the ones that Systemd has not attempted to load.

key.name: systemd-section-filter-priority-list
key.summary: Show only services in priority list
key.description: Show only services in priority list. If disabled, all services will be shown.

key.name: systemd-section-items-priority-list
key.default: "apache2, apparmor, cron, crond, docker, docker-desktop, firewalld, mariadb, memcached, mongodb, mysql, postgresql, redis-server"
key.description: A comma-separated list of Systemd services which will be always shown on top.

key.name: cron-section-enabled
key.description: Show Cron section in the menu.

key.name: docker-section-enabled
key.description: Show Docker section in the menu.

key.name: docker-section-show-images
key.description: Show Docker images. If disabled, only Docker containers will be shown.

key.name: podman-section-enabled
key.description: Show Podman section in the menu.

key.name: podman-section-show-images
key.description: Show Podman images. If disabled, only Podman containers will be shown.
